FAQ / Keywords /

Star

  1. Some cards refer to the number of stars a character has. Does a character in bot mode have any stars? [Source: WotC]
    Yes. Even though the stars are printed on the alt mode side of the card, the character has that number of stars no matter which mode itâ€™s in.
  2. Please explain the general rules on the battle cards with stars on the bottom? If you already have a 25-character deck, can you still put them in your deck for pip purposes and/or play them? Why is there a star on the bottom? Or do you have to have extra stars available to even put it into your battle deck? [Source: WotC]
    You have to have extra stars available to put star battle cards in your battle deck.
